Header: Three suspects arrested for assaulting and detaining a person
Content: Three suspects who had detained a person after assaulting him have been taken into custody. The raid had been carried out by the Panadura Divisional Law Enforcement Unit. The Police had received information that a person from the Bandaragama Koswatte area had been assaulted and detained. It is in this respect that the suspects had been taken into custody. The person who was detained has been admitted to the Hospital. Two persons linked to the abduction and the driver of the van that was used for this purpose have been apprehended. The van has also been taken into custody. The owner of the location where the injured was serving had been kidnapped in this manner and detained. However, the main suspect linked to the incident had fled the area and the Police said that they are engaged in the conduct of a raid to arrest him.
